data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Saarland, Germany.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saarland, Germany
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Saarland who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 47 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 21,313 believers in Saarland and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Saarland, Germany who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Mongol, Khalka people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Saarland, Germany that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Saarland to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saarland, Germany has a population of 1,022,600.

We estimate Saarland has 21,313 people who might know Jesus, 605,140 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 396,147 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 47 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 21,313 believers in the state of Saarland to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
